short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e: AI 驱动的 RSS/SDD 选择器/生成器
short.en: An AI-powered RSS reader and manager

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e:
AiRss是一款智能的数据提取和RSS订阅源生成工具，它能帮助用户轻松地将任何网页转换为特定数据格式。通过AI辅助和可视化操作，配合服务器端，可以让RSS生成过程变得简单直观。

AiRss支持 openai/api2d.com/siliconflow.cn 以及其他兼容OpenAI 接口的平台。

推荐使用 siliconflow.cn 的 Qwen/Qwen2.5-7B-Instruct 模型，主要是免费。

建议先观看教学视频后使用：https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1GJkdYdE9i/
long.en:
AiRss is an intelligent data extraction and RSS feed generation tool that helps users easily convert any webpage into a specific data format. With AI assistance and a visualized operation interface, combined with server-side support, it makes the RSS generation process simple and intuitive.

AiRss supports platforms like openai/api2d.com/siliconflow.cn and other OpenAI-compatible interfaces.

It is recommended to use the Qwen/Qwen2.5-7B-Instruct model provided by siliconflow.cn, mainly because it is free.
